LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.label: 2A38M
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_2A38M.description:
a dual-barrel heavy autocannon for infantry suppress / anti air platform.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.

LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.label: recoilless cannon
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.description:
A Recoilless cannon designed to snipe the heavy-armed target in range.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.

LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Recoilless.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.label: mech HMG
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.description:
heavy machine gun for mech soldier or infantry support platform.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyMachineGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.label: sniper cannon
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.description:
an ultra heavy rifle calibered with autocannon rounds, has proven the capability to snipe an exostrider in the distance. it is specially designed for long-range anti-mech sniping operation.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SniperCannon.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: sniper cannon
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.label: anti-tank gun
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.description:
A lightweight mass produced anti-tank gun for heavy mechs and dragoon armor.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.label: heavy grenade launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.description:
A hand held gun-mortar designed for mech operation. A six round revolver action allows for quick successive shots.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.label: MPQFS-85M "Dawnblade"
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.description:
A multi-role quick-firing gun modified mech use, only capable of being mounted on super-heavy units like the Tarbosaurus. Its terrifying rate of fire and power have proven to be effective at destroying exostriders in past mechanoid wars.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, and it's too heavy so only specific automatroid can operate.
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_DragoonRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
